name: 裘百明
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
week 1 Bulats orientation and course description
week 2 job descriptions and job satisfaction
week 3 letter of inquiry and application
week 4 telephone skills
week 5 promotional activities and branding
week 6 new product development
week 7 a stand at a trade fair
week 8 establishing relationships and negotiating
week 9 mid-term exam
week 10 going it alone
week 11 financing the start-up
week 12 sarting up in a new location
week 13 presenting your business idea
week 14 business hotel and sales conferences
week 15 business conference
week 16 reports
week 17 business meeting
week 18 final exam
scorePolicy:
class participation 10%
quiz                20%
mid-term exam       30%
final exam          40%
